## Meeting.usePhoneAudio() method

Use phone for meeting audio

**Signature:**

```typescript
usePhoneAudio(phoneNumber: string): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  phoneNumber | string | If provided, it will dial-out using this number. If not provided, dial-in will be used |

**Returns:**

any

{<!-- -->Promise<!-- -->} Resolves once the dial-in or dial-out request has completed, or rejects if it failed

 Meeting
